title: Ben Webster - Soulville 1957 / VME 2003
description:
Ben Webster, Soulville, 1957


Big Ben !!

On this 1957 date, the great Ben Webster is teamed up with the great Oscar Peterson Quartet.
A swinging, bluesy, absolutely earthy session. Webster digs into a set of low-key ballads and greasy blues songs.
This is a highly recommended set for Webster and Peterson fans alike.



The Ben Webster Quintet

Soulville 1957


CD / VME / 2003 / 320Kbps

 

Tracklist:
 1.  Soulville
 2.  Late Date
 3.  Time on My Hands 
 4.  Lover, Come Back to Me 
 5.  Where Are You? 
 6.  Makin' Whoopee
 7.  Ill Wind 
 8.  Who? (*)
 9.  Boogie Woogie (*)
 10. Roses of Picardy (*)


Tracks 8 to 10 are bonus tracks with Ben Webster on piano and Stan Levey on drums



Personnel: 

Ben Webster, tenor saxophone, piano

with

The Oscar Peterson Quartet:

Oscar Peterson, piano 
Herb Ellis, guitar
Ray Brown, bass
Stan Levey, drums


 
Recorded in Hollywood, California on October 15, 1957.



:)
